alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 4:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Gulf, Wakulla, central Gadsden, southeastern Liberty, Leon and Franklin Counties through 530 AM EST/430 AM CST/... At 445 AM EST/345 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Quincy to 9 miles southwest of Apalachicola. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, St. Marks, Midway, Woodville, Crawfordville, St George Island, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Florida A And M, Wakulla, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford and Jewel Fire Tower. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EST/800 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
